name: Rosemary Mint
description:
This bar will wake you up in the morning!  This is a brisk, clean, minty blend of essential  oils.

Contains olive, palm kernel, palm, avocado, rice bran & castor oils, essential oils, sugar, kaolin clay, micas, titanium dioxide, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Blackberry Sage
description:
The perfect blend of juicy blackberries tempered with sage.

Contains olive, palm kernel, palm, avocado, rice bran & castor oils, fragrance oil, sugar, titanium dioxide, micas, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Blackberry Jam
description:
This scent is described as a well-rounded blend of ripe, tart blackberries with base notes of vanilla and fresh greenery. 

Contains olive, palm kernel, palm, avocado & castor oils, fragrance oil, coconut milk powder, sugar, kaolin clay, sodium lactate, titanium dioxide, micas, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Teakwood
description:
An exotic blend of teakwood surrounded by rich spices of cardamom, cinnamon, and clove.

Contains olive, palm kernel, palm, avocado, rice bran & castor oils, fragrance oil, sugar, kaolin clay, mica, titanium dioxide, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Esplanade
description:
This fragrance is a medley of bright, green essential oils giving way to an irresistible spice blend, which then leads to a long-lived, soapy clean woodsy finish.

Contains rice bran, palm kernel, palm, avocado & castor oils, fragrance oil, sugar, kaolin clay, titanium dioxide, micas, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Hummingbird
description:
This fun, flowery and fruity fragrance has tart kiwi, lilac, tiger lily, pineapples and pears.

Contains olive, palm kernel, palm, avocado & castor oils, fragrance oil, coconut milk powder, sugar, kaolin clay, sodium lactate, titanium dioxide, micas, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Pumpkin
description:
Someone must be baking a pie!  A scrumptious blend of smooth pumpkin with the warm, spicy notes of nutmeg, clove and cinnamon topped with a rich layer of butter! 

Contains olive, palm kernel, palm, avocado, rice bran & castor oils, fragrance oil, pumpkin, sugar, kaolin clay, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Bamboo
description:
This fresh, complex fragrance begins with notes of white grapefruit and tangerine, mandarin, mimosa and notes of bamboo, juniper and musk.

Contains olive, palm kernel, palm, avocado, rice bran & castor oils, fragrance oil, sugar, kaolin clay, mica, titanium dioxide, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Mandarin
description:
A nice, uni-sex fresh fragrance  - notes of the orient and citrus.

Contains olive, palm kernel, palm, avocado, rice bran & castor oils, essential oils, sugar, kaolin clay, micas, titanium dioxide, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Rain
description:
A fresh and clean spa-like scent.  Oriental gardens covered in mist with whispers of soft powdery musk. 

Contains olive, palm kernel, palm, avocado, rice bran & castor oils, fragrance oil, sugar, kaolin clay, titanium dioxide, sodium lactate, micas, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Honey
description:
This is a warm, sweet and nutty honey with notes of butter, almond, rose and chocolate. 
  
Contains palm kernel, rice bran, palm, avocado, olive pomace & castor oils, fragrance oil, powdered goatsmilk, kaolin clay, honey, sodium lactate, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Lavender Vanilla
description:
A well-rounded blend of lavender and vanilla beans with orange zest and a touch of patchouli.

Contains palm kernel, rice bran, palm, avocado, olive pomace & castor oils, fragrance oil, sugar, kaolin clay, mica, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Starfruit
description:
Golden starfruit, juicy peach and green apple come together in this scent. They are accompanied by fruity orange and sparkling grapefruit with hints of lily and herbal green.

Contains palm kernel, rice bran, palm, olive, avocado & castor oils, fragrance oil, sugar, kaolin  clay, titanium dioxide, micas, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Cinnamon Buns
description:
This is a rich, spicy cinnamon - very decadent!

Contains palm kernel, rice bran, palm, avocado, olive pomace & castor oils, fragrance oil, sugar, powdered goatsmilk, tussah silk & cinnamon.

name: Pixie
description:
This bar has lots of fruity notes with a bouquet of citrus - a boldly swirled, brightly colored, unisex spa scent.

Contains rice bran, olive, palm kernel & palm oils, sugar, fragrance oil, tussah silk, micas & glitter.

name: Hydrogen
description:
This is a fresh, clean, ozone scent with lots of creamy bubbles.

Contains saponified palm, rice bran, palm kernel & olive oils, distilled water, fragrance oil & micas.

name: Banana Boat
description:
This unique fragrance starts with fresh bananas and juicy grapefruit, then adds kiwi, juicy bubblegum, strawberries and a hint of vanilla. 

Contains rice bran, palm, palm kernel, olive & castor oils, fragrance oil, kaolin clay, sodium lactate, titanium dioxide, tussah silk, colorants & glitter.

name: Rosey
description:
A unique and fascinating fragrance blending rose, pomegranate, bergamot, cannabis accord, jasmine, dark chocolate, white musk, patchouli, and oolong tea.  Sweet, clean and crisp!

Contains rice bran, palm kernel, castor & palm oils, cocoa & shea butters, coconut milk, fragrance oil, kaolin clay, sodium lactate, titanium dioxide, tussah silk, colorants & glitter.

name: India
description:
This is a slightly sweet and mysterious floral.

Contains rice bran, palm, palm kernel, olive & castor oils, fragrance oil, sodium lactate, titanium dioxide, colorants & glitter.

name: Lilac
description:
This bar smells like an armful of fresh-cut lilacs.

Contains rice bran, palm kernel, castor & palm oils, cocoa & shea butters, coconut milk, fragrance oil, kaolin clay, sodium lactate, titanium dioxide, tussah silk, colorant & glitter.

name: Lemon Ice
description:
This is a juicy, zesty citrus that is unforgettable!  If you love crisp, citrusy lemon, then you'll love this bar. 

Contains rice bran, palm kernel, palm, avocado & castor oils, coconut milk, fragrance oil, kaolin clay, sodium lactate, titanium dioxide, tussah silk, colorant & glitter.

name: Moroccan Fig
description:
This scent is slightly exotic while keeping just right mix of ripeness and zest.  Great unisex fragrance!

Contains palm, pice bran, palm kernel & hazelnut oils, distilled water, fragrance oil, sugar, fig powder & tussah silk.

name: Dreamscicle
description:
Soft orange citrus and heartwarming vanilla are blended together in a sweet scented dream bar!  This soap is a mellow orange pink with jojoba spheres for extremely gentle exfoliating.  

Contains rice bran, palm and palm kernel oils, cocoa butter, fragrance oil, sugar, jojoba spheres and tussah silk.

name: Sakura Hana Cake
description:
Full sized cake of soap delicately scented with a bouquet of oriental florals.  Cake weighs 45 oz., 9" in diameter.  Could slice into at least 8 individual pieces.

Contains palm kernel, rice bran, palm, olive & castor oils, fragrance oil, sugar, cornstarch, kaolin clay, titanium dioxide, micas & glitter.

name: CocoLime Verbena Soap Cake
description:
Full cake of soap that is a dreamy blend of coconut and lime with hints of verbena, vanilla and musk.  Cake weighs 60 oz., 9" in diameter.  Could slice into at least 8 individual pieces.

Contains palm kernel, rice bran, palm, olive & castor oils, fragrance oil, cornstarch, kaolin clay, buttermilk powder, titanium dioxide, colorant & glitter.

name: Strawberry Rhubarb Cupcake (large)
description:
Cupcakes with fresh, sweet strawberries mixed with sour rhubarb marmalade and a touch of flaky pie crust.

Contains saponified palm, palm kernel, rice bran & castor oils, shea butter, fragrance oil, sugar, titanium dioxide, colorants & glitter.

name: Strawberry Rhubarb Cupcakes (small)
description:
Cupcakes with fresh, sweet strawberries mixed with sour rhubarb marmalade and a touch of flaky pie crust.

Contains saponified palm, palm kernel, rice bran & castor oils, shea butter, fragrance oil, sugar, titanium dioxide, colorants & glitter.

name: Tuscan Herb Bath Salts
description:
Intoxicating aromas of fresh off the vine tomatoes, red currants, leafy greens and Italian basil, with underlying tones of earth and sandalwood.

Contains epsom, solar sea and dendritic salts, fragrance oil and colorant. 16 oz.

name: Calbrian Violet Bath Salts
description:
Like bathing on the privacy of your deck surrounded by flowers, this is a fresh, clean, delicate floral scent for your bath.

Contains epsom, solar sea and dendritic salts, fragrance oil and colorant. 16 oz.

name: Blooming Lavender Bath Salts
description:
A sweet and sophisticated lavender complimented with soft floral and woody notes makes for a heavenly bath soak!  

Contains epsom, solar sea and dendritic salts, fragrance oil and colorant. 16 oz.

name: Sonora
description: Saponified Rice Bran, Palm, Palm Kernel, Olive & Castor Oils, Fragrance Oil, Kaolin Clay, Coconut Water Concentrate, Sodium Lactate, Titanium Dioxide, Tussah Silk, Colorants & Glitter

name: Sunrise
description:
Spicy berry orange with a touch of patchouli and a hint of fir, this bar has a deeply satisfying aroma that will remind you of an early morning sunrise.

Contains saponified rice bran, palm kernel, castor & palm oils, cocoa & shea butters, fragrance oil, kaolin clay, coconut water concentrate, titanium dioxide, tussah silk, colorant & glitter.

name: Lavender
description:
This bar has a wonderful lavender aroma!

Contains saponified olive, olive pomace, palm, coconut & castor oils, essential & fragrance oils, sugar, kaolin clay, sodium lactate, titanium dioxide, tussah silk, micas & glitter.

name: Green Tea
description:
This bar, containing real green tea, is unique and refreshing with a subtle tea aroma.  

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel, olive & castor oils, green tea, fragrance oil, sugar, sodium lactate, tussah silk, micas & glitter.

name: Tuscan Lace
description:
This is a soft amber musk fragrance with a touch of sweet earth. 

Rice Bran, Palm & Palm Kernel Oils, Distilled Water, Cocoa Butter, Fragrance Oil, Sugar, Tussah Silk & Mica

name: Root Beer
description:
Made with real Abita Root Beer, this bar smells true to its name!

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel, olive & castor oils, Abita Root Beer, fragrance oil, kaolin clay, cornstarch, titanium dioxide, sodium lactate & glitter.

name: Amber Lager
description:
This bar is made with real Abita Amber beer with a sweet beer fragrance along with strawberry, apple, grape, citrus, honey and vanilla.

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel, apricot kernel & castor oils, Abita Amber beer, fragrance oil, kaolin clay, cornstarch & sodium lactate.

name: Cola Fizz
description:
This soap has the real aroma of a carbonated cola!  Your nose will almost tingle!

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel & olive oils, distilled water, fragrance oil, coconut cream, sodium lactate, colorant, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Hot Cocoa
description:
The aroma of warm hot chocolate with melted marshmallow topping - perfect for the chocoholics in all of us!  

Contains saponified palm, rice bran, palm kernel & olive oils, distilled water, fragrance oil, cocoa powder, mica & tussah silk.

name: Lavender Martini
description:
Lavender mixed with vodka, sage and basil, then touched with white musk and soft woods.  A scent that is very clean and zen-like.  

Contains saponified rice bran, palm kernel, avocado, palm & castor oils, distilled water, fragrance oil, sodium lactate, titanium dioxide, micas & glitter.

name: Oatmeal Stout
description:
This one smells positively edible! It's a full bodied and smooth beer fragrance blended with oatmeal, orange peel, butterscotch, fresh milk, almond and vanilla. 

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel, olive & castor oils, Abita Turbodog beer, fragrance oil, kaolin clay, cornstarch, oatmeal, cocoa powder & sodium lactate.

name: Raspberry Lager
description:
Malt liquor with a fruity twist.  This one has notes of malt liquor and hops with fruity notes of strawberry, pineapple, apple, and raspberry. 

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel, apricot kernel & castor oils, Abita Purple Haze beer, fragrance oil, kaolin clay, cornstarch, sodium lactate & colorant.

name: Strawberry Ale
description:
This is a sweet beer type fragrance that is a fruity and sweet mixture that is heavy on strawberry, with apples, citrus, honey and vanilla.

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel, olive & castor oils, Abita Strawberry Harvest beer, fragrance oil, strawberries, kaolin clay, cornstarch, colorant, sodium lactate, cranberry seeds & glitter.

name: Tootsie Butter
description:
This rich, creamy butter is perfect for winter toes and heels, as well as tootsies, hands and elbows any time of the year!  Scented with an essential oil blend of peppermint and grapefruit.  

Contains aloe juice, cocoa butter, meadowfoam oil, BTMS-50, E-Wax, cetyl alcohol, hydrovance, dimethicone, sodium lactate, silk amino acids, essential oils, cyclomethicone, IPM, preservative & allantoin.

name: Carnation
description:
This bar has a crisp, clean aroma of freshly picked carnation flowers with notes of fresh greenery. A wonderfully fresh floral!  

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel & olive oils, distilled water, fragrance oil, coconut cream, sodium lactate, colorant & tussah silk.

name: Pumpkin Fields
description:
This bar contains lavender essential oil, real pumpkin and coconut milk.  It has a complex scent that will remind you of lavender and fresh pumpkin blended with orange peel, sweet carrot, ground cinnamon, clove bud, nutmeg and vanilla cream.  

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel & avocado oils, fragrance oils, pumpkin, coconut milk, essential oil, kaolin clay, sodium lactate, tussah silk & glitter.

name: Yogurt and Coconut Cream (unscented)
description:
This bar contains real greek yogurt and coconut cream.  No scented oils were added, and this bar just smells like good, clean soap!  

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel, apricot kernel & castor oils, yogurt, coconut cream, kaolin clay, sodium lactate & tussah silk.

name: Cinnamon Buttermilk
description:
This bar is slightly exfoliating due to real cinnamon and oatmeal.  Scented with cinnamon, oatmeal, buttermilk and honey.  

Contains saponified rice bran, palm kernel, palm, grapeseed & castor oils, fragrance oils, sugar, oatmeal, buttermilk powder, kaolin clay, cinnamon, sodium lactate & tussah silk.

name: Peppermint
description:
This fresh mint and earthy bar is scented with essential oils of mints, fir needle and patchouli.  

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel, olive & castor oils, essential oils, coconut milk, sugar, kaolin clay, sodium lactate, tussah silk, micas & glitter.

name: EveningSpryte
description:
This purple and blue swirled bar smells like juicy, sun-ripened blackberries with hints of sage.  

Contains saponified rice bran, palm, palm kernel, almond, castor & apricot kernel oils, fragrance oil, sugar, kaolin clay, titanium dioxide, tussah silk, colorant & glitter.

name: ForestSpryte
description:
This green swirled and glittered bar has the fresh scent of the forest with sprytes dancing all around!  It is a blend of three different mints with a touch of black tea. It is cool, crisp and refreshing!  

Contains rice bran, palm, palm kernel, almond and castor oils, kaolin clay and silk for lots of bubbles!

name: Licorice Twist
description:
This gorgeous black and white swirled bar smells just like the real thing - and the glitter on top is the icing on the cake!  

Contains saponified rice bran, palm kernel, palm, avocado & castor oils, fragrance oil, sodium lactate,  titanium dioxide, charcoal, tussah silk & glitter.
